body_html:
I am facing the similar issue

ERROR: /private/var/tmp/_bazel_azain/45a5c55226309e7282643bd8440e7750/external/local_config_cuda/cuda/BUILD:1302:1: Executing genrule @local_config_cuda//cuda:cudnn-include failed: bash failed: error executing command /bin/bash -c ... (remaining 1 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.
ln: bazel-out/local-py3-opt/genfiles/external/local_config_cuda/cuda/includeinclude/cudnn.h: No such file or directory
Target //tensorflow/tools/graph_transforms:summarize_graph failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.

in the path it says incluceinclude/cudnn.h. I assume something is going wrong with the path.. Any help please?
